net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: changes = "[-20,-10,-5,0,'+5','+10','+20']"] [h: junk = abort(input("elevation|"+elevation+"|Set Elevation (0 clears)|text", "elevation_index|" + json.toList(changes) + "|Elevation Change|radio|SELECT=3 ORIENT=H SPAN=TRUE" ))] [h: elevation = add(elevation, number(json.get(changes,elevation_index)))] [h,if(elevation == 0):resetProperty("elevation");setProperty("elevation", elevation)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Change Elevation
